excerpt: "This burnout has affected the patient-doctor relationship, said Matthew Ko, co-founder of DeepScribe, an AI-powered medical transcription startup that announced a $5.2M seed round on Thursday. The company is specifically looking to alleviate physician burnout by reducing time spent on paperwork."
